titleStmt.title: A dialogue betweene a vertuous gentleman and a popish priest [ ... ]pleasaunt and profitable, both for ministers and gentlemen, men and vvomen, old and yong, made by I.B.
titleStmt.author: I. B., fl. 1581.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Waldegraue, dwelling without Temple-barre, neere vnto Sommerset-House,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
